channel.title: Documentation on Blake Niemyjski
channel.description: Recent content in Documentation on Blake Niemyjski

item.title: Product Documentation
item.description: This afternoon I started on creating the documentation for how to customize Community Server Enterprise Reporting. I’m going to be working on this for a while, because there are so many things one can customize, like: Multiple database connections, Declarative report model, Enabling and disabling reports, Configuring reports, And much more! One thing that I have noticed over the past couple of years is that a lot of the documentation running in the wild is usually not that good.
